name: Naturias>Sylvans
author: <TCB> Deadfun
notes: Finally after 3 months of trying i made it to kog with naturia. The Trunades are a great addition since a floodgate would stop the naturia plays very hard. Before trunade i used anti magic arrows but people know that naturia play ama so i switched to trunade. If you wanna have some fun try it out but dont expect it to be a easy king of games run. I needed a lot of wins to finally get to kog. Also Im the first guy who posts a kog naturia list :P
